technologies.name: Sitecore
technologies.description: Sitecore provides web content management, and multichannel marketing automation software.

technologies.name: Magento
technologies.description: Magento is an open-source ecommerce platform written in PHP.

technologies.name: Sentry
technologies.description: Sentry is an open-source platform for workflow productivity, aggregating errors from across the stack in real time.

technologies.name: TypeScript
technologies.description: TypeScript is an open-source language which builds on JavaScript  by adding static type definitions.

technologies.name: MySQL
technologies.description: MySQL is an open-source relational database management system.

technologies.name: PHP
technologies.description: PHP is a general-purpose scripting language used for web development.

technologies.name: Leaflet
technologies.description: Leaflet is the open-source JavaScript library for mobile-friendly interactive maps.

technologies.name: Microsoft ASP.NET
technologies.description: ASP.NET is an open-source, server-side web-application framework designed for web development to produce dynamic web pages.

technologies.name: Angular
technologies.description: Angular is a TypeScript-based open-source web application framework led by the Angular Team at Google.

technologies.name: Nginx
technologies.description: Nginx is a web server that can also be used as a reverse proxy, load balancer, mail proxy and HTTP cache.

technologies.name: Livefyre
technologies.description: Livefyre is a platform that integrates with the social web to boost social interaction.

technologies.name: Google Analytics
technologies.description: Google Analytics is a free web analytics service that tracks and reports website traffic.

technologies.name: Font Awesome
technologies.description: Font Awesome is a font and icon toolkit based on CSS and Less.

technologies.name: Crisp Live Chat
technologies.description: Crisp Live Chat is a live chat solution with free and paid options.

technologies.name: Airtable
technologies.description: Airtable is a low-code platform for building collaborative apps.

technologies.name: Sendinblue
technologies.description: Sendinblue is an email marketing solution for small and medium-sized businesses that want to send and automate email marketing campaigns.

technologies.name: Google Workspace
technologies.description: Google Workspace, formerly G Suite, is a collection of cloud computing, productivity and collaboration tools.

technologies.name: Webpack
technologies.description: Webpack is an open-source JavaScript module bundler.

technologies.name: Open Graph
technologies.description: Open Graph is a protocol that is used to integrate any web page into the social graph.

technologies.name: Module Federation
technologies.description: Module Federation is a webpack technology for dynamically loading parts of other independently deployed builds.
